
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/GuijiH6/p/18779572" title="发布于 2025-03-18 19:05">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Hack The Box-代理连接及靶机-Meow-喵呜</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h2 id="前言">前言</h2>
<p>​           在第一层，您将获得网络安全渗透测试领域的基本技能。您将首先学习如何匿名连接到各种服务，例如 <strong>FTP、SMB、Telnet、Rsync 和 RDP</strong>。接下来，您将发现 Nmap 的强大功能，这是一种用于识别目标系统上的开放端口的宝贵工具，可让您评估其漏洞。最后，您将探索连接到 MongoDB 服务器，为您的渗透测试知识增加一层宝贵的知识。这一层将为您进入网络安全领域奠定坚实的基础。</p>
<h2 id="连接方式">连接方式</h2>
<p>点击此处</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318190113552.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>选择<strong>openvpn</strong>，然后选择一个节点下载即可</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318190146079.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>把下载的文件拖入<strong>kali</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318190221940.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>挂上代理，使用openvpn连接即可</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318190251700.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第一问">第一问</h2>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318174221019.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第二问">第二问</h2>
<p>我们使用什么工具与操作系统交互，以便通过命令行发出命令，例如启动VPN连接的命令？它也被称为控制台或shell。</p>
<p><strong>terminal-终端</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318174622800.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第三问">第三问</h2>
<p>我们使用什么服务将VPN连接到HTB实验室？ <strong>openvpn</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318174729676.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第四问">第四问</h2>
<p>我们使用什么工具来测试我们与<strong>ICMP回显</strong>请求的目标连接？  <strong>ping</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318174911934.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第五问">第五问</h2>
<p>在目标上查找开放端口的最常见工具的名称是什么？  <strong>nmap</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318174949777.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第六问">第六问</h2>
<p>在扫描过程中，我们在端口23/tcp上识别出什么服务？  <strong>telnet-远程登录</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318175038206.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>答案</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318175108365.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第七问">第七问</h2>
<p>什么用户名可以用空密码通过<strong>telnet</strong>登录目标？  <strong>root</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318175219562.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="第八问">第八问</h2>
<p><strong>telnet</strong>登录</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318175813964.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查看flag</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318175740356.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>解决</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250318175659386.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
